name: Shepherd Apocalypse 1.1
description:
Lead your flock to safety while avoiding volcanic debris! Shepherd Apocalypse is a 2D game lovingly crafted out of felt. The game was made in two days for the 2015 Global Game Jam. This edition has 2 new levels and additional polish!

We'd like to turn this prototype into a full-fledged game complete with multiple levels, new mechanics and possibly support for other devices. If you like the game, let us know by commenting, liking or sharing the official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/shepherdapocalypse

Download a desktop build below for a more hi-res and hi-fuzz experience!

Crafted by:

Jason Ronzani - www.jasonronzani.com

Ivan Sayon - www.ivansayon.com
